entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
